name: Alliance! Story Mode!
description:
Welcome to Alliance! Story Mode!

Alliance! Story Mode! is based off the board game, Alliance!

This is an adventure fantasy game while you play as King Harry, ruler of the town of Yorkshire. You must help the locals of your Kingdom and other Kingdoms by defeating the evil King. 

BEFORE PLAYING THE GAME

  • Familiarize yourself with the Poker Hand Ranking System. It is the same system Alliance! uses. (Refer to image below)
  • Alliance! Story Mode! is based off Alliance! the board game. While both games are similar, they are not direct copies of each other.
  • This game and the board game were both part of a school project.

References 

  • Pixel Pete 
  • Blank Pixels 
  • Rekkimaru

Thank you for the assets!
